message.body: How r u doing? What r u up to?
Dinner. Driving back in tomorrow morning
Ok. Beautiful here. Can't wait to bd here w u in august!

Me too! I think tech JUST got the $10mm endowment at the end of this year. I don't remember where they got it from, probably alumni, but I thought it was ridiculous when I heard it cuz they always complain that we have no money
Yeah and they certainly haven't been spending that kind of money on anything obvious
I think they are renovating the auditorium including installing an air conditioner
I met a woman today who's son just finished his freshman year at Emory and liked it. Harlan cutshall from Maine. Played club tennis and model un where he
